Key:
(Yaaawn... Even though it's right before lunch,
I'm getting pretty sleepy...)

(Hm?! A call on my phone...?
Who could it be this early?)

(The house? The only one home at this time would
be Yoshino...)

(No matter what it is, I can't pick up in the
middle of class...)
(They hung up... I wonder who it was?)

(If it were someone from Ratatoskr, they'd
contact me through my earpiece... Could it be that
Yoshino called my cell number on her own?)
(Well, I can call her back during lunch break...)
